Package propra.imageconverter.image

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • propra.imageconverter.image.Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Node>
    public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Node>
    A Node in a huffman tree. A Node can either be a leave Node, or the root of a (sub-)tree.

      Constructs a Node, with leftChild and rightChild as left and right children.

      • getWeight

        public int getWeight()
        Get weight of the current Node. This is either the value from Field weight (if the Node is a leave), or it's the sum of the whole sub-tree.
        Returns:
        weight of the current sub-tree.

      • getNodeDepth

        public int getNodeDepth()
        Calculates the depth of the sub-tree where this Node is the root of.
        Returns:
        sub-tree depth.

      • appendNode

        public Node appendNode​(Node newNode)
        Appends a Node at the next possible position to the tree.

        Attention! This node is not the root of the tree. This Node is the Node, that got added last. To find the next suitable position, this function checks, if this Node is a leave. If it is, this function goes the tree upwards and always checks in it's way up, if there is one Node, where newNode can get added to. If this Node is not a leave, this function tries to append newNode first as left and otherwise as right child.

        Parameters:
        newNode - Node to be appended.
        Returns:
        just appended Node.

      • isAppendable

        public boolean isAppendable()
        Checks, whether it is possible, to add a Node to the current tree. Checks therefore, if this tree contains any leave, that is not a leave in our meaning, so this leave does not contain a symbol.
        Returns:
        if it is possible to append a Node to the tree.

      • buildHuffmanTable

        public void buildHuffmanTable​(java.lang.String parentCode,
                              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Byte,​java.lang.String> huffmanTable)
        Builds the huffman table for this tree.

        The huffman table is a HashMap with the symbol of a leave (as Byte) as key, and the code (how to get to there from the root) for this leave. A 0 means, you go to the left child, whereas a 1 means, you go to the right child.

        Parameters:
        parentCode - code for the parent of a node.
        huffmanTable - huffman table to be built.

      • getTreeInPreOrder

        public java.lang.String getTreeInPreOrder()
        Returns a String that represents this tree in Pre-Order. 0 is used for each inner node (including the root node), 1 is used, followed by the 8 bits from the symbol in binary notation for leaves.
        Returns:
        Pre-Order String of this tree, including the symbols as 8 bit binary.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(Node o)
        Compares two Nodes, based on their weight, and in case the weight is equal, based on the depth of their sub-tree.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Node>
        Parameters:
        o - Node to compare to.
        Returns:
        -1, if this Node is less than Node o, otherwise returns 1
